content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5), boiler (position -21.5, 28.0), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5).

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace at position(0, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5, 5) and a furnace at position(5, 5)

### Pipe group at position(-9.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following pipes:
- Pipe (position -9.5, 19.5)
- Pipe (position -9.5, 20.5)
- Pipe (position -9.5, 21.5)
- Pipe (position -9.5, 22.5)
- Pipe (position -9.5, 23.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to incorrect Position object usage
- Verify that the second argument in functions requiring a Position object is indeed a valid Position object. Check the function calls to ensure the correct data type is being passed.
